page.title: 13COIT SCHOOL DINNERS
page.content: Coit school dinners are cooked on the premises.The dinners vary every day of the week there are usually healthy food,for example salad,potatoes and vegetables.we only have chips once a week and not very often have battered fish .We like to eat chips,fish fingers and fishcake,and toffee tart.The dinner ladies insist that we try everything but we don't always like it.The dinner ladies bring trays of food and the older children serve it out.There is a big kitchen where they cook food.The dinner ladies who do not work in the kitchen wipe the tables and generally supervise the children.Also we don't enjoy eating new potatoes every day of the week.
